body.name: Suclain 2 Pcs Push Broom Outdoor Wide Heavy Duty Broom with Long Handle Stiff Bristles Concrete Brush Commercial for Cleaning Bathroom Kitchen Patio Garage Shop Deck Concrete Tile Floor (18 Inch)

features: Quality and Quantity: enjoy boosted cleaning efficiency with our 2 pack of outdoor broom set built to last; Made from robust plastic and quality metal, these brooms are constructed to withstand a variety of cleaning challenges and are suitable for both home and professional use

Proper Dimensions: our push broom outdoor is just the right size for cleaning performance; With a size of brush in approximately 18 x 4 x 3 inches/ 45 x 10.5 x 8 cm, this broom is designed to cover a large surface area, so your cleaning tasks will be completed in no time

Stylish and Functional Design: not only does our 18" wide stiff outdoor brooms for sweeping patio come in an attractive color as shown in the picture, its style is also practical; With a 5 layers hard bristle and a 45°angle, it can easily sweep off dirt from a variety of surfaces

Package Includes: With each purchase, you get 2 pack of efficient push broom indoor; Double the tools, double the productivity! Start getting more out of your cleaning sessions with our reliable and versatile cleaning solutions

Humanized Comfort: we understand that comfort is key when cleaning; Our commercial broom comes with an adjustable metal pole that can be lengthened from 48 inches to 62 inches; Just adjust the number of poles and sweep, no bending required
body.description: Features: These brooms for sweeping outdoor aren't just good looking, they are amazingly versatile too. Their tough bristles and wide reach make them suitable tool for sweeping heavy dirt, debris, or gravel on a variety of surfaces. From your garden pathways to your warehouse floors, this broom has got you covered. Experience cleaning power with our 5 layers hard bristle design. Each bristle is designed to effectively gather and push dust and debris, ensuring a clean surface in less time, and with less effort. Specifications: Material: plastic, metal Color: as picture shown Size: about 18 x 4 x 3 inches/ 45 x 10.5 x 8 cm Package includes: 2 x Push broom brush Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality. Should hold up well over time.
reviews.reviewText: This 2 pcs set of outdoor heavy-duty brooms with long lightweight metal handles work as expected. They are priced fairly. The 24-inch width allows me to sweep out my deck and garage quickly and efficiently. This is as good as any push broom I have used in the past, and better than many.
